name: Pop Star Girls Salon Dress Up
name_original: Pop Star Girls Salon Dress Up
description:
Let’s play amazing Pop Star Dress up Game For Kids and Adults!

In this game amazing beautiful Pop Star with beautiful beautiful theme. In this game there are three different character and variety of makeup collection with various types. Come and vive your girl an incomparable beauty. It’s amazing cool makeover game with beautiful location.

In this game there are three different levels Like spa, makeup and dress up. In this spa levels there are so many different cream for face and scrub. Apply one be one and completed this treatment.

In this second levels is make up. In this levels there are different hairstyle, eyebro, eyeline, nose ring, earrning etc. And last level is dress up. There are so many endless dress up collection and so many outfit collection for ice queen princess.

Every girl loves to go to salon and makeup. It’s amazing princess game for girl’s.

Features:
- Beautiful and very high quality graphics.
- Three different characters.
- There are so many different cosmetic items.
- HD stunning graphics.
- Endless outfit dress up collection.
- Save and share photo functionality.

Easy
- We care about you and that's why we made our gameplay very easy to play. You can control our little girl easily!

Awesome environment
- We have designed an awesome graphics environment that you will love.

For Anyone
- It’s free game and it can be played by Adults and Teens. Your whole family can play it and they will enjoy it!

So are you ready for play this amazing Pop Star Dress Up Game!

Don’t forget review us!
